wasara siyayakatath wada parani panwila kandukaraye pihiti alliyadda gammanayata podu pahasukam kisiwak labagatha nohakiwa ehi gamwasihu ithamath dukbara jiwithayak gathakarathi.dumbara kandukarayen galana moragaha oya gamata dakunu paththen da, huluganga game pahalin da, kotaganga gamata dakunu paththen da, pihita athi bawin gannga thunakata madiwa athi me gammanayata thawamath bayisikalayakin gaman kirimatawath marga pahasukamak natha.ek paththakin panwila pradeshiya lekam kottasaye mayimath, anek paththen madadumbara pradeshiya lekam kottasaye mayimath madiwa me parani gammanaya pihita athath eka kottasayakinwath mema gammanaya nangasituwimata awashya mulika pahasukam salasa denne nathayi gamwasihu chodana karathi.game thun paththakinma ganngawal pihitimath, gamata ihalin kanduwatiyak pihitima saha gamata yana margaye kandu pallam thibimath nisa ema adupadu game diyunuwata pradhana badhayak wi atha.paha wasara dakwa pamanak panthi athi game pasalen adhyapanaya nimakarana daru dariyanta ihala panthi athi pasalakata yamata kilomitar thuna hathara payin yamata siduwa athi nisa bohomayak daru dariyanta wadidura igenimata nohakiwa atha.
